basics.name: Piotr Bechcicki
basics.label: Frontend Engineer
basics.summary:
Experienced Software Engineer skilled in FullStack development. 
Proven track record in launching successful products from the ground up. 
Adaptable, team-oriented, and efficient, with a focus on clean coding. 
Committed to delivering quality software. 
Currently based in Barcelona.

work.name: Glovo
highlights: Developed in-house invoicing solutions for Glovo partners
Built a first revenue-making user-facing Glovo FinTech product from scratch
Performed A/B & E2E testing and covered solutions with observability tooling
Led a modularisation of a FinTech owned frontend module and its migration from Vue2 to Vue3
Participated in 2 hackatons, extending Glovo iOS app & implementing GPT-powered features

work.name: CodiLime
highlights: Built an interface for a Data Science end-to-end platform from scratch
Built a library to draw an interactive graph to audit network traffic from scratch
Built a POC interface extension to ONOS - Open Network Operating System (open source)
Led a development of network management system UI
Worked closely with Scandinavian and US clients

work.name: Samsung Electronics
highlights: Built showcase webapps for the newest versions of Tizen OS working on TV screens
Developed a web platform for managing content and data across multiple devices
Built a webapp to improve Samsung B2B clients surveying
